text: Greatest Hits is a compilation album by Stevie Ray Vaughan released in 1995. It was also released on vinyl in the U.S. ==Track listing== #"Taxman" - Previously unreleased #"Texas Flood" - Texas Flood #"The House is Rockin'" - In Step #"Pride and Joy" - Texas Flood #"Tightrope" - In Step #"Little Wing" - The Sky Is Crying #"Crossfire" - In Step #"Change It" - Soul to Soul #"Cold Shot" - Couldn't Stand The Weather #"Couldn't Stand the Weather" - Couldn't Stand The Weather #"Life Without You" - Soul To Soul ==Charts== {| class="wikitable" |- !Chart (1996) !Peak position |- |Australia (Kent Music Report) | style="text-align:center;"|62 |} ==Certifications== ==References== Category:Stevie Ray Vaughan albums Category:1995 greatest hits albums
title: Greatest Hits (Stevie Ray Vaughan album)
